summary: In London, a military plane crashes leaving its highly classified contents strewn across the city. Completely unaware that the city is in lockdown, a group of people become trapped inside a storage facility with a highly unwelcome guest.
cast: Noel Clarke|Colin O'Donoghue|Antonia Campbell-Hughes|Laura Haddock|Jamie Thomas King|Alex Price|Ned Dennehy|Geoff Bell|Ruth Gemmell|Davie Fairbanks|Amy Louise Pemberton|Robert Freeman|John Hasler
title: Storage 24
